pages.text: 95|1|injeer tatha zaitoon kee shapath
95|2|evan "toore seeneen" kee shapath
95|3|aur is shaanti ke nagar kee shapath
95|4|hamane inasaan ko manohar roop mein paida kiya hai.
95|5|phir use sabase neeche gira diya.
95|6|parantu, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, unake lie aisa badala hai, jo kabhee samaapt nahin hoga.
95|7|phir (tum maanav jaati) pratiphal (badale) ke din ko kyon jhuthalaate ho
95|8|kya allaah sab adhikaariyon se badh kar adhikaaree nahin hai
96|1|apane paalanahaar ke naam se padh, jisane paida kiya.
96|2|jis ne manushy ko rakt ko lothade se paida kiya.
96|3|padh, aur tera paalanahaar bada daya vaala hai.
96|4|jis ne lekhanee ke dvaara gyaan sikhaaya.
96|5|insaan ko usaka gyaan diya jis ko vah nahin jaanata tha.
96|6|vaastav mein, insaan sarakashee karata hai.
96|7|isalie ki vah svayan ko nishchint (dhanavaan) samajhata hai.
96|8|nihsandeh, phir tere paalanahaar kee or palat kar jaana hai.
96|9|kya tumane use dekha jo rokata hai.
96|10|ek bhakt ko, jab vah namaaz ada kare.
96|11|bhala dekho to, yadi vah seedhe maarg par ho.
96|12|ya allaah se darane ka aadesh deta ho
96|13|aur dekho to, yadi usane jhuthalaaya tatha munh phera ho
96|14|kya vah nahin jaanata ki allaah use dekh raha hai
96|15|nishchay yadi vah nahin rukata, to ham use maathe ke bal ghasetenge.
96|16|jhoothe aur paapee maathe ke bal.
96|17|to vah apanee sabha ko bula le.
96|18|ham bhee narak ke farishton ko bulaayenge.
96|19|(he bhakt) kadaapi usakee baat na suno tatha sajda karo aur mere sameep ho jao.
